00020 #include <sstream>
00021 
00022 #include "rhbdscanresult.h"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 void RHbdScanResult::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00029 {
00030     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00031         w->write_f32(robotPose.x);
00032         w->write_f32(robotPose.y);
00033                 w->write_f32(robotPose.theta);
00034         w->write_f32(distance);
00035         w->write_f32(fovx);
00036         w->write_i8(victimResult);
00037     w->doneWriting();
00038 }
00039 
00040 void RHbdScanResult::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00041 {
00042     r->startReading(getClassName());
00043         robotPose.x = r->read_f32();
00044         robotPose.y = r->read_f32();
00045         robotPose.theta = r->read_f32();
00046         distance = r->read_f32();
00047         fovx = r->read_f32();
00048         victimResult = (VictimResult) r->read_i8();
00049     r->doneReading();
00050 }
00051 
00052 RDK2::Object* RHbdScanResult::clone() const
00053 {
00054     return new RHbdScanResult(*this);
00055 }
00056
